* ![Generic badge](https://badgen.net/badge/_/_?style=flat&logo=#7A1FA2.svg) `匯入資料`
```diff
# excel in orange
# csv  in orange
# json in orange
```
* ![Generic badge](https://badgen.net/badge/_/_?style=flat&logo=#7A1FA2.svg) `資料清理`  
* ![Generic badge](https://badgen.net/badge/_/_?style=flat&logo=#7A1FA2.svg) `繪圖` 
  * EDA  
```html
   <span style="color: green"> Some green text </span>
```
  
*![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E5%9C%96%E6%A1%88-XiangYun%E7%A8%8B%E5%BC%8F-purple?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)

```diff
- text -in red
+ text in green
! text in orange
# text in gray
@@ text in purple (and bold)@@
```
